name: Wormwood
description: Wormwood is an effective product for osteochondrosis, osteoarthritis and injuries. It can quickly eliminate pain from osteoarthritis and osteochondrosis. Reduces muscle spasm and inflammation, and effective treatment for osteochondrosis and osteoarthritis because it slows the cartilaginous tissue degeneration process, and improves metabolism to promote regeneration of articular cartilage. The positive effect can be seen after the first application. When used regularly, diseases of joints and backbone are stopped fast.
